last_episode_to_air.name: Episode 6
last_episode_to_air.overview: As the series hurtles to a climax, Lennox makes a shocking discovery that turns the case on its head; all is not as it seems and the truth behind these murders lies closer to home.

name: Crime
overview: Detective Inspector Ray Lennox investigates the disappearance of a schoolgirl while battling cocaine addiction and a mental breakdown.
tagline: One man’s fight for his very soul.

episodes.name: Episode 1
episodes.overview: DI Ray Lennox and his partner are investigating the disappearance of schoolgirl.

episodes.name: Episode 2
episodes.overview: As Lennox wrestles with his sobriety, the investigation continues.

guest_stars.character: Member of Police Committee for Scotland
guest_stars.name: Holly Woodhouse

episodes.name: Episode 3
episodes.overview: Lennox must use all his guile and cunning to expose those with something to hide.

episodes.name: Episode 4
episodes.overview: Another young girl has gone missing, but Lennox thinks he can lure the perpetrator in.

episodes.name: Episode 5
episodes.overview: Lennox interrogates the suspect about the girl. Will he be able to save her in time?

episodes.name: Episode 6
episodes.overview: Lennox must face his demons to help him uncover the truth about the case.

episodes.name: Episode 1
episodes.overview: DI Ray Lennox is back - determined to prove he can put the Confectioner case behind him and be a normal cop. When an ex-colleague is assaulted, Lennox gets stuck into a new case.

episodes.name: Episode 2
episodes.overview: There’s a development in the case when a body turns up with similar injuries to the victim of the rumoured hotel attack. The victim has an obscure message carved into his body.

episodes.name: Episode 3
episodes.overview: The attacker floods the internet with their manifesto and declares there will be a third victim. The race is on for Lennox and his team to prevent another death.

episodes.name: Episode 4
episodes.overview: The case continues to evade Lennox; he has a connection between the victims but can’t find a motive. As he struggles to find answers, Lennox’s past trauma comes back hard.

episodes.name: Episode 5
episodes.overview: As Lennox wrestles with the consequences of his actions, the hunt to catch the killer ramps up when one of his own team is targeted. Lennox and Drummond look back at a 1992 case.

episodes.name: Episode 6
episodes.overview: As the series hurtles to a climax, Lennox makes a shocking discovery that turns the case on its head; all is not as it seems and the truth behind these murders lies closer to home.
